content.prompt: In lines 22-24, the speaker suggests that “true joys” are “dream enough” in that

choices.label: as time goes by, memories of childhood inevitably fade
because life is fleeting, its joys are necessarily temporary
once true joys have been experienced, dreams become irrelevant
even lovers who remain together can find that their love gradually diminishes

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
